job_details.duration: Project-based, approximately 6 months with possibility of extension

jd: From: Eli, RCube Creative Consulting eli@rcubecreativeconsulting.com Reply to: eli@rcubecreativeconsulting.com Job Title : Data Engineer Super urgent requirementTarget Start Date: 18-Nov-2024End Date: 25-Apr-2025 (extensions possible)Location: Remote, but candidates local to Chicago is preferred. If not Chicago, local to another PS office on CST/EST.Client : Implementation / publicis Sapient MUST PROVIDE : i94+travel. FOR ANY REASON CANNOT PROVIDE PLEASE AVOID. MUST HAVE 10+ years of experienceExpertise in Azure SQL and DatabricksExperience with Azure Data Factory and GraphQL to perform ETL and SSIS jobsProven ability to develop high-performing queries, optimize database schemas, and conduct data-driven unit tests to validate SQL Design and Implementation: Utilize expertise in Azure SQL, Databricks, Azure Data Factory, and GraphQL to design, develop, and maintain backend data solutions, ensuring scalability, reliability, and performanceDevOps Mindset: Emphasize high-quality, clean code practices with a DevOps approach, including logging, alerting, monitoring, and fostering an innovative cultureAgile Collaboration: Engage in agile processes for product backlog grooming, sprint planning, and active contribution to coding best practices, reviews, and test validationsPerformance Tuning: Develop high-performing queries, efficient DB schemas, and perform data-driven unit tests to validate SQL, ensuring optimized backend systemsCloud Deployment: Demonstrate proven experience with deploying production services in Azure, including functions like Azure Functions, Service Bus, and GraphQL, while managing source control with Git
